article: the indonesia 's aceh provincial governor office unk its activities , nearly two weeks after tsunami disaster hit the province on dec. ## , media reported on friday .
abstract: bureaucracy in tsunami hit aceh indonesia back in action
candidates: the indonesian 's aceh provincial governor office unk is still carrying out its activities nearly two weeks after tsunami disaster hit the province.
